winget.name: Everything
winget.description: Everything is search engine that locates files and folders by filename instantly for Windows. Unlike Windows search Everything initially displays every file and folder on your computer (hence the name Everything). You type in a search filter to limit what files and folders are displayed.

winget.name: EverythingToolbar
winget.description: With EverythingToolbar you can instantly search files and folders by name directly in the Windows taskbar with Everything. It allows quick and easy file indexing and fast searches.

winget.name: Calibre
winget.description: Calibre is a cross-platform e-book library management application developed by users of e-books for users of e-books.

winget.name: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
winget.description: Ubuntu is a free and open-source Linux distribution based on Debian.

winget.name: NTLite
winget.description: NTLite is a free and open-source Windows customization tool that allows you to remove Windows components, integrate drivers, apply hotfixes, and more.

winget.name: Jq
winget.description: Jq is a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.

winget.name: Process Explorer
winget.description: Process Explorer is a free and open-source task manager for Windows.

winget.name: Process Monitor
winget.description: Process Monitor is a free and open-source process monitoring tool for Windows.

winget.name: Autoruns
winget.description: Autoruns is a free and open-source tool that displays the programs that automatically run when your system boots and logs in.

winget.name: PowerToys (Preview)
winget.description: PowerToys is a set of utilities for power users to tune and streamline their Windows 10 experience for greater productivity.

winget.name: SyncTrayzor
winget.description: SyncTrayzor is a free and open-source Syncthing tray application for Windows.

winget.name: 7-Zip
winget.description: 7-Zip is a free and open-source file archiver, a utility used to place groups of files within compressed containers known as "archives".

winget.name: SumatraPDF
winget.description: SumatraPDF is a free and open-source PDF, ePub, MOBI, CHM, XPS, DjVu, CBZ, CBR reader for Windows.

winget.name: VNC Viewer
winget.description: VNC Viewer is a free and open-source remote desktop software application developed by RealVNC.

winget.name: VNC Server
winget.description: VNC Server is a free and open-source remote desktop software application developed by RealVNC.

winget.name: TigerVNC
winget.description: TigerVNC is a free and open-source remote desktop software application developed by the TigerVNC project.

winget.name: LibreOffice
winget.description: LibreOffice is a free and open-source office suite, a project of The Document Foundation.

winget.name: OpenOffice
winget.description: Apache OpenOffice is a free and open-source office suite, a project of The Apache Software Foundation.

winget.name: Transmission
winget.description: Transmission is a free and open-source BitTorrent client.

winget.name: Qbittorrent
winget.description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client developed by volunteers in their spare time.

winget.name: HWiNFO
winget.description: HWiNFO is a free and open-source hardware information and diagnostic tool for Windows.

winget.name: Rufus
winget.description: Rufus is a free and open-source utility that helps format and create bootable USB flash drives, such as USB keys/pendrives, memory sticks, etc.

winget.name: BalenaEtcher
winget.description: Etcher is a free and open-source software for flashing OS images to SD cards and USB drives, safely and easily.

winget.name: Audacity
winget.description: Audacity is a free and open-source cross-platform audio software for multi-track recording and editing.

winget.name: HandBrake
winget.description: HandBrake is a free and open-source video transcoder.

winget.name: Streamlink
winget.description: Streamlink is a free and open-source command-line utility that extracts streams from various services and pipes them into a video player of choice.

winget.name: WinSCP
winget.description: WinSCP is a free and open-source SFTP, SCP, WebDAV, and FTP client for Windows.

winget.name: yt-dlp
winget.description: yt-dlp is a free and open-source command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other video platforms.

winget.name: Feeder
winget.description: Feeder is a free and open-source RSS reader for Windows.

winget.name: Oracle VM VirtualBox
winget.description: Oracle VM VirtualBox is a free and open-source hosted hypervisor for x86 virtualization, developed by Oracle Corporation.

winget.name: ShareX
winget.description: ShareX is a lightweight free and open source program that allows you to capture or record any area of your screen and share it with a single press of a key. ShareX offers numerous methods of capture including full screen, monitor, freehand and so much more. It also features plenty of customizable after-capture tasks and supports more than 80 different image, text, and file hosting services, as well as many URL shortening and sharing services.

winget.name: Greenshot
winget.description: Greenshot is a free and open-source screenshot tool optimized for productivity.

winget.name: Bandicam
winget.description: Bandicam is a free and open-source screen recorder for Windows.

winget.name: CutePDF Writer
winget.description: CutePDF Writer, Create PDFs from almost any application.

winget.name: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC (64-bit)
winget.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software is the free, trusted global standard for viewing, printing, signing, sharing, and annotating PDFs. It's the only PDF viewer that can open and interact with all types of PDF content, including forms and multimedia.

winget.name: Qalculate!
winget.description: A highly versatile desktop calculator, with support for units, physical constants, uncertainty propagation, symbolic calculations, etc.
